name: Lepiota
description:
A game made in my 2nd year of uni to explore the Fungus asset. It's my first 3D Game! It's a bit jagged around the edges due to having to develop 2 games at the same time, but I had a lot of fun making it. 

You play a confused human who ended up in the world of fairies!

Use WASD to move, Mouse Click to select options (the movement is a bit awkward if you're playing fullscreen, sorry!) and E to interact with objects. 

Music: 

Dream Culture Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
